Pack Module

The pack interface allows anyone to fetch the public metadata about any of the on-chain packs, and it allows users to check their pack ownership, transfer packs to others, and most importantly to open packs.

Methods

class thirdweb.modules.pack.PackModule(address: str, client: thirdweb_web3.main.Web3)
address: str

Gets all the packs. :return: List of metadata for all the packs.

balance_of(address: str, token_id: int) → int

Gets the balance of a token for a given address. :param address: The address to get the balance for. :param token_id: The token id to get the balance for. :return: The balance of the token for the given address.

balance(token_id: int) → int

Gets the balance of a token for the current address. :param token_id: The token id to get the balance for. :return: The balance of the token for the pack.

is_approved(address: str, operator: str) → bool

Checks if a given address is approved by a given operator. :param address: The address to check. :param operator: The operator to check. :return: True if the address is approved by the operator.

set_approval(operator: str, approved: bool)
transfer(to_address: str, token_id: int, amount: int)

Transfers a token to a given address. :param to_address: The address to transfer the token to. :param token_id: The token id to transfer. :param amount: The amount to transfer. :return: The transaction receipt.

create(arg: thirdweb.types.pack.CreatePackArg) → thirdweb.types.pack.PackMetadata

WIP: This method is not ready to be called.

Suffers from same issue as MarketModule.list :param arg: The arguments to create the pack with. :return: The metadata for the newly created pack.

transfer_from(from_address: str, to_address: str, args: thirdweb.types.pack.AssetAmountPair)

Transfers a token from a given address to a given address. :param from_address: The address to transfer the token from. :param to_address: The address to transfer the token to. :param args: The token id and amount to transfer. :return: The transaction receipt.

transfer_batch_from(from_address: str, to_address: str, args: List[thirdweb.types.pack.AssetAmountPair])

Transfers a batch of tokens from a given address to a given address. :param from_address: The address to transfer the token from. :param to_address: The address to transfer the token to. :param args: The token ids and amounts to transfer. :return: The transaction receipt.

set_royalty_bps(amount: int)

Sets the royalty BPS for the pack. :param amount: The amount to set the royalty BPS to. :return: The transaction receipt.

set_restricted_transfer(restricted: bool = True)

Sets restricted transfer for the NFT, defaults to restricted. :param restricted: Whether to grant restricted transfer or revoke it

get_abi_module() → thirdweb.abi.pack.Pack

Gets the ABI module for the pack. :return: The ABI module for the pack.

class thirdweb.types.pack.CreatePackArg(asset_contract_address: str, metadata: Union[str, dict], assets: List[thirdweb.types.pack.AssetAmountPair], rewards_per_open: int = 1, seconds_until_open_start: int = 0)

CreatePackArg assembles the parameters used to create a new Pack

Args:

asset_contract_address: The address of the asset being put in the pack metadata: The metadata of the pack (name, description, image, etc) assets: The list of assets (pair of [id, amount]) to list in in the pack rewards_per_open: The number of tokens that will be awarded when opening the pack seconds_until_open_start: The number of seconds the pack is allowed to be opened

asset_contract_address: str
metadata: Union[str, dict]
assets: List[thirdweb.types.pack.AssetAmountPair]
rewards_per_open: int = 1
seconds_until_open_start: int = 0
